name: Legs
description: Exercises primarily targeting the muscles of the lower body.

name: Full Body
description: Compound exercises engaging multiple muscle groups across the body.

name: Chest
description: Exercises focused on the pectoral muscles and surrounding areas.

name: Shoulders
description: Exercises designed to strengthen the deltoid muscles.

name: Back
description: Exercises for the muscles of the back, including lats, rhomboids, and traps.

name: Core
description: Exercises that strengthen the abdominal muscles, obliques, and lower back.

name: Arms
description: Exercises specifically for the biceps, triceps, and forearms.

name: Cardio
description: Exercises focused on cardiovascular endurance and heart health.

name: Flexibility
description: Exercises to improve range of motion and reduce muscle stiffness.
